## ensureTimeField() function

### ensureTimeField() function

Checks the first value. Assumes any number should be time fieldtype. Otherwise attempts to make the fieldtype time.

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
export declare function ensureTimeField(field: Field, dateFormat?: string): Field;
```
<b>Import</b>

```typescript
import { ensureTimeField } from '@grafana/data';
```
<b>Parameters</b>

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  field | <code>Field</code> | field to ensure is a time fieldtype |
|  dateFormat | <code>string</code> | date format used to parse a string datetime |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Field`

field as time
